reviews.review: топ нечего делать поиграйте и не будет скучно
very very great game one of the best story games in the world
игра классная я вот играл с другом ваще полдёшь
You gotta be a total moron to not recommend this game.
傲娇又腹黑的GlaDos小姐姐虽然总想弄死我但是唱歌真好听
Portal 2 is everything you loved about portal 1. Follows up the prequel storyline well. Puzzles are engaging and rewarding to complete. More fun easter eggs to discover. Its a good game

Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado, la historia parece simple pero es mas compleja de lo que parece a simple vista.
Los puzzles son muy divertidos y muy bien pensados, los personajes aunque pocos son lo suficientemente interesantes para mantener la historia.
El juego en si es muy corto pero si tomas en cuenta el modo coop y las salas de la comunidad puedes tener muchisimas mas horas de juego.
Incredibly fun and enjoyable game. The single player story is incredible whilst co-op also is extremely fun.
not too long of a game as it only took 6 hours. very good game, well made. final boss was kinda eh though. 9/10
крутая игра не смотря на свою давность
a sequel that isnt shit. wish valve could count to 3
Cool puzzle game that has cool and interesting easter eggs and a wonderful story game. First play store mode. Recommended

a very fun and exciting puzzle game and it will take a bit of your time to beat the single player mode and its very good! i recommend this to anyone who has played portal 1 or just wants to play a fun puzzle game
Worth every penny, feels like it should be better than Portal but doesn't quite have the charm. Also that voice actor is really annoying.
very good lore and it gives you a special vibe if you've played portal 1 before
The coop mode made me want to punch my friend.
Portal 2 to już klasyk w którego każdy powinien zagrać. Silnikiem fizycznym dorównuje a może i przewyższa większość ówczesnych tytułów
Bardzo fajna gra z dobrymi dialogami a zagadki są przyjemne
this is a very good game the story is fantastic and the level is not so hard to pass if you play this first time im real sure you gonna love this game

Totally a must for everyone who consider him- or herself a gamer. Also, recommend it to any of your non-gamer friends, if you want to get them hooked into gaming. Never met anyone who didn't like Portal 2 and if i ever will meet such a person, I will not consider them human.
Ładna grafika, ciekawa oraz oryginalna fabuła i śmieszne żarty połączone w jedną bardzo dobrze zrobioną całość 10/10.
10/10 головоломки, 10/10 сюжет, 10/10 оптимизация (идёт на слабом пк с нормальной графикой) . Рекомендую всем!
Harika bir klasik. 1 defa crack oynadım ve bunu satın alıp hakkını vereceğime söz verdim. Kesinlikle oynamalısınız.
голос уитли классный, модуль милый, игра Интересная, познавательная, всем советую.
Отличная игра с отличным сюжетом, полная юмора и головоломок. Здорово играть с другом
被still alive这首歌吸引而来，确实好玩~~
What can I even say? It's basically the perfect game
Lots of fun, gets your brain working to complete most of the chambers but overall a great puzzle game with a brilliant story linked to its first game: portal.

An exemplary sequel that certainly does justice to it's first game. [b]More game-mechanics, more story, more fun[/b]. If you are wondering to get this game or not, do.

The game also features a pretty cool co-op mission where you can test your teamwork. It also comes with a level editor which is cool and you can upload or download levels in the Workshop.
вполне не плохая игрушка для компании, можно хорошо посмеяться и сломать мозги
hikayesi half life dan daha iyi coop a daha fazla hikaye ekleyebilirler ama glados bile yeter.
I cried it was so good
oyun baya sarıyor oynamanızı tavsiye ederim

[b] Hala almadınız mı ? [/b] diye başlamak istiyorum. Bir bulmacayı çözemedikçe daha çok zevk vermesi nasıl olabilir ? bu oyun bulmacaları çözemedikçe sizi sıkmıyor, aksine daha çok denemeye itiyor. İlk oyunun ardından bu oyun yeni yeni bulmaca mekanikleriyle, hele hele hikayesiyle ve müzikleriyle muhteşem olmuş. Valve gerçekten bu işi yapmış. Bütün her şey çok güzeldi, sadece müzikleri için bile alınır. Tam anlamıyla bir [b] [i] "Masterpiece" [/i] [/b].


[b] [i] -Now I only want you gone [/i] [/b]
very fun, would recommend playing the first one before this

This game and the original Portal are really great games with amazing stories, puzzles, music, and everything! Seriously one of my favorite games ever. You will NOT regret buying this game, but make sure you buy the original Portal first or some of the story won't make any sense to you.

재미있음 우리의 뇌를 속이고있음
근데 결말 유튜브로 본사람은 이게임 사지마셈
난 지금도 후회돼고있음
游戏前期说实话，并没有什么亮点，但后面是真的有感觉，游戏画面也很精美。价格也很实惠，极力推荐！！！

Absolutely amazing

Puzzles - Sometimes challenging, sometimes nice and easy to complete

Visuals - Impressive considering how old the game is

Storyline - One of the best I know... There are so many hidden easter eggs around, secrets, dialogue, it's great

Do buy it if you have even a small interest in it

I have been playing this game for MANY years, and only recently got it on PC. This game isn't as big brain as Portal 1, but it's certainly not for people who stare at the juice carton because it says "concentrate".

“Portal 2” is a fantastic puzzle based FPS game that can be completed in about 5-7 hours or less depending on your skill level (personal experience). It can also run on a potato of a PC, so even people without amazing rigs can still enjoy it!

Absolutely, without a doubt, the greatest game I've ever played in my life.  I first played this game on its original release date back in 2011, and i have to say almost ten years later, i will never forget the impact it had on me. The characters, music, gameplay mechanics, world building, environmental storytelling, humor, it is all perfect to me.  This is without a doubt the most unforgettable experience I've ever gotten from a video game.  PLEASE buy this game!
Good game, very creative and can run on almost any computer.

Possivelmente o melhor jogo de puzzle já criado, sério eu nem sei por que eu estou escrevendo uma review de Portal 2 em pleno 2021, se você nunca jogou, jogue. Ou então pelo menos leia umas reviews e jogue depois.

A campanha é sensacional, com uma ótima história mesmo se o jogador não tiver jogado o primeiro jogo, além disso o jogo ainda tem um modo multiplayer para jogar com 2 jogadores online ou por tela dividida que é tão bem feito quanto a campanha, e tudo fica mais legal com um amigo, então pode-se dizer que o multiplayer é ainda melhor que a campanha. As fases também são sensacionais nunca muito fáceis mas também nunca impossiveis de descobrir as respostas, na medida certa para você se sentir muito bem após descobrir como passar.
